item.title: What We Know About the Shooting in Midtown Manhattan

item.title: Park Avenue Gunman Drove Cross Country Before the Attack, Police Said
item.description: The police said that he had a history of mental illness documented in Nevada and that it was unclear why he targeted the building.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Is First Republican Lawmaker to Call Gaza Crisis a ‘Genocide’
item.description: Ms. Greene is the first Republican in Congress to use the term to describe the dire humanitarian situation in Gaza, two years after she led the push t...

item.title: ‘Worst-Case Scenario of Famine’ Unfolding in Gaza, U.N.-Backed Body Says
item.description: Access to food has plummeted to unprecedented levels, a monitoring group warned, as global outrage over Israel’s aid restrictions persisted.
